'''Raliteff''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and [[spell]] inventor who lived during the [[Shadowed Age]].
document_data.History: Raliteff developed two spells during their life. The spells they invented were ''[[erase]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|3184|NY}} and ''[[illusionary script]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|3185|NY}}.
